description:
Our bed & breakfast is close to parks, the city center, and art and culture. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed and the coziness. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.  Wake up each morning to a hearty breakfast.

Quiet, convenient and cozy.

As needed.

Quiet

Express Bus: We are just 3 blocks away from the #Bx-M8 express bus to Manhattan. (Recommended for its comfort and convenience). 
Subway: The #22 bus stops on the corner of the block. That takes you to the #6 train in 5 minutes. 
Parking: Free parking included with stay.

Breakfast; pick up and drop off from/to the airport can be arraigned. Baby with parents welcome without extra charge.
name: Bronx Bed and Breakfast
review: David and Elaine were very welcoming and a pleasure to meet. The place was perfect for our stay. There was a bus stop was right down the street and the subway less than a mile away. It was very clean and well organized. We will definitely save this place on our favorites list.
